page.title: 05Traffic
page.content: Whitchurch is quite a busy place.On any day of the week you will always see lots of traffic in the town centre,with traffic passing through the town on it's way to somewhere else or people coming to do their shopping. It is not so busy now the by-pass takes a lot of the traffic around the town.When there was no by-pass then all the traffic from Southampton to the North had to come through the town and there were very many traffic jams,especially when they had to try to get through the centre of the town where the roads meet. We did a survey of the traffic passing through the town centre to seewhich roads were the busiest and our results are on the next page of text.
